frame.name: Fire_burning
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Fire</fen> burns <fen>Fuel</fen>, resulting in damage and possibly complete destruction of the <fen>Fuel</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Fire">A fire that started on Saturday afternoon, the High Glade Fire - located on the Mendocino National Forest's Upper Lake Ranger District</fex> - continued to <t>burn</t> <fex name="Manner">actively</fex> <fex name="Time">on Sunday</fex>.</ex>
<ex>Since the <t>fire</t> is <fex name="Place">near a road</fex> and also <fex name="Place">on part of the Appalachian Trail</fex>, the Forest Service said a main concern is the safety of the public.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Fire</fen> is burning.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Fire</fen> is burning.</def-root>

FE.name: Fire
FE.definition: <def-root>The total material currently involved in combustion, including both the parts of the <fen>Fuel</fen> currently undergoing chemical alteration and the partially ionized gas that results from this process.</def-root>

FE.name: Fuel
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity that is undergoing rapid chemical alteration leading to damage or destruction.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the Fire event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>).</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The amount of time that the <fen>Fire</fen> burns.
</def-root>

FE.name: Result
FE.definition:
<def-root>The state or category of the affected entity after the event.
<ex>The house <t>burned</t> <fex name="Result">to ash</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Subregion
FE.definition:
<def-root>The part of the affected entity that undergoes the process evoked by the target.
<ex>The walls <t>burned</t> <fex name="Subregion">to the ground</fex> .</ex> <ex>The house was already <t>on fire</t>, <fex name="Subregion">in the kitchen and one bedroom</fex> .</ex></def-root>
